news_list.desc: Yugyoung Yun, Junhyuk So, Juncheol Shin, and Jiwoong Shin joined our lab. Welcome!
Our paper titled "One-Shot Tuner for Deep Learning Compilers" is accepted for publication in CC!
Our paper titled "Near-Data Processing in Memory Expander for DNN Acceleration on GPUs" is accepted for publication in IEEE CAL!
Our paper titled "Hybrid Register Allocation with Spill Cost and Pattern Guided Optimization" is accepted for publication in LCPC!
Juseong Park has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Hyojin Sung
Sein Park has joined as a MS student advised by Prof. Eunhyeok Park
Jueon Park has joined as a MS student advised by Prof. Hyojin Sung
HyungCheol Geum has joined as a MS student advised by Prof. Eunhyeok Park
Hyungkyu Ham has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
Jeongmin Hong has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
Eunhyeok Park, an assistant professor, has joined to our group
Hyunuk Cho has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
Yongwon Shin has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Hyojin Sung
Jaehun Ryu has joined as a MS student advised by Prof. Hyojin Sung
Junho Lee has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
Yeongsang Jang has joined as an Integrated MS/PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
Sungjun Cho has joined as a PhD student advised by Prof. Gwangsun Kim
